article: The terrible story of the whale As soon as he finished his homework, Eric jumped on his bicycle and rode off in the direction of the beach. While he was  _  along, he thought about the whales. He hoped he would see them again today. After he got to the beach, Eric  _  his bicycle behind a bush so that no one could see it from the road. Then he ran down to the beach.  _  it was only four in the afternoon, the sky was already getting dark. Eric Frowned . If it  _  , he wouldn't be able to see the whales because they would stay in deeper water. He hurried along the beach  _  the rocks. They were the best places to watch the whales because of their  _  . Before Eric reached the rocks he felt a drop of water on his head. "Oh no!" he thought. "Now the whales will stay in the deep water and I won't be able to  _  them!" But just then he saw a large shape on the beach. It was a young whale! The whale was too close to the shore and got stuck on the  _  ! At first the whale didn't move at all and Eric thought it was  _  ! Then he saw its tail move weakly. Eric turned and ran in the rain as fast as he could back to his bicycle. He had to get  _  ! If they didn't get the whale back in the water soon, it would die and Eric couldn't let that happen.
